titleStmt.title: A true discourse concerning the certaine possession and dispossession of 7 persons in one familie in Lancashire, which also may serve as part of an answere to a fayned and false discoverie which speaketh very much evill, aswell of this, as of the rest of those great and mightie workes of God which bee of the like excellent nature. / by George More, minister and preacher of the worde of God, and now (for bearing witnesse vnto this, and for iustifying the rest) a prisoner in the Clinke, where he hath continued almost for the space of two yeares..
titleStmt.author: More, George.

titleStmt.title: A true discourse concerning the certaine possession and dispossession of 7 persons in one familie in Lancashire, which also may serve as part of an answere to a fayned and false discoverie which speaketh very much evill, aswell of this, as of the rest of those great and mightie workes of God which bee of the like excellent nature. / by George More, minister and preacher of the worde of God, and now (for bearing witnesse vnto this, and for iustifying the rest) a prisoner in the Clinke, where he hath continued almost for the space of two yeares..
titleStmt.author: More, George.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Printer's ornament t.p., headpieces, tailpieces, initials, printed marginalia.
A reply to: Harsnett, Samuel. A discovery of the fraudulent practises of John Darrel.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
